author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION HONE CONTINUES MOVING WEST NORTHWESTWARD...
summary:
...TROPICAL DEPRESSION HONE CONTINUES MOVING WEST NORTHWESTWARD...
 As of 11:00 PM HST Thu Aug 29
 the center of Hone was located near 21.6, -174.0
 with movement WNW at 7 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1008 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Depression Hone (CP1/CP012024)
